title: Did the Saudis travel outside the United States? While airspace was still closed after 9/11?
subtitle: It is rumored that a secret flight transported some prominent Saudis and Osama bin Laden's relatives outside the United States of America during the air travel ban.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The secret flights transported members of the Bin Laden family and Saudi citizens from the United States immediately after September 11, while the general ban on air travel was still in force, before the FBI had any opportunity to question any passengers.
